name: Last Stand (clownfetish)
description:
Only one color. Only one wolf. Only one hunter. Only one bullet. Only one health. Only one minute.

Rubber Biscuit Font Family by dabnot

Rain Background Sound and Dog Growl Sound by Mike Koenig
Human Heartbeat Sound by Daniel Simio
Dog Barking Sound fron SoundBible.com

Chromatic Shader by musnik
Wolf Sprites by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener and William.Thompsonj
All other art by Casual and I (Clown Fetish)

Followed tutorials by Cameron Penner
Programming and all the rest by me
